text.section: All fees and other moneys received by the board pursuant to the provisions of KRS 329A.010 to 329A.090 shall be deposited in the State Treasury to the credit of a revolving fund for the use of the board.
No part of this revolving fund shall revert to the general fund of this Commonwealth.

law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 269, sec. 5, effective July 15, 2002.
